item.title: Change Zellij keybinds to be like Tmux
item.description: Go to your zellij config file nvim ~/.config/zellij/config.kdl. Update your keybinds like this.

item.title: Clean Architecture A Craftsman's Guide to Software Structure and Design by Robert C. Martin
item.description: Chapter 1: What Is Design and Architecture? Architecture vs Design: There is no difference between the two, not at all.

item.title: Compile Protobuf for Go
item.description: Install protoc-gen-go plugin for go go install google.golang.org/protobuf/cmd/protoc-gen-go@latest Compile your .proto file with Go and gRPC options protoc --go_out=.

item.title: Customize VScode UI fonts
item.description: Install Custom UI Style Extension. Open settings.json by press command + shift + p and search for settings.json. Add this line to your settings.

item.title: Graceful Shutdown in Go
item.description: More info: victoriametrics.com/blog/go-graceful-shutdown c := make(chan os.Signal, 1) signal.Notify(c, os.Interrupt, syscall.SIGTERM) go func() { <-c log.Println("Shutting down server...") _ = s.app.Shutdown(context.Background()) log.Println("Server stopped") }().

item.title: How to run a html live-server from Terminal
item.description: Since I started using Zed as my main editor, Iâ€™ve run into a few annoying problems. One of them is the lack of a live-server feature.

item.title: Leetcode - Two Sum
item.description: Link - leetcode.com/problems/two-sum/description/ seen = {} for i, num in enumerate(nums): need = target - num if need in seen: return [seen[need], i] seen[num] = i Explains Traverse the list only once.

item.title: LongCat-Flash-Thinking Technical Report
